org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.parse

Class ReplicationSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.parse.ReplicationSpec

  • public class ReplicationSpec
extends Object
    Statements executed to handle replication have some additional information relevant to the replication subsystem - this class captures those bits of information. Typically, this corresponds to the replicationClause definition in the parser.

                                String replacementReplState)
        Parameters:
        currReplState - Current object state
        replacementReplState - Replacement-candidate state
        Returns:
        whether or not a provided replacement candidate is newer(or equal) to the existing object state or not

      • allowReplacementInto

        public boolean allowReplacementInto(Map<String,String> params)
        Determines if a current replication object (current state of dump) is allowed to replicate-replace-into a given metastore object (based on state_id stored in their parameters)

      • allowEventReplacementInto

        public boolean allowEventReplacementInto(Map<String,String> params)
        Determines if a current replication event (based on event id) is allowed to replicate-replace-into a given metastore object (based on state_id stored in their parameters)
